projectDescription:
Utilized NextJS, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS to construct the UI
Implemented an auth system using JWT and HTTP-only cookies and authorization via a custom middleware
Crafted MongoDB aggregation pipelines for data population, implemented pre-hooks, and developed custom methods
techStack: Typescript, NextJS, Tailwind CSS, React Query, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB, Mongoose, Cloudinary, Turborepo

projectDescription:

techStack: Javascript, ReactJS, Styled Components, Recharts, React Query, React Hook Form, React Hot Toast, Supabase
